keyValuePairs.description: Keys are properties of the object, and values are the data stored in the properties.
keyValuePairs.properties: Properties are surrounded by double quotes, the same as strings.
keyValuePairs.numbersBooleans: Numbers and booleans are written as they are.
keyValuePairs.separator: The key-value pairs are separated by a colon.
keyValuePairs.comma: The key-value pairs are separated by commas.
keyValuePairs.enclosure: The key-value pairs are enclosed in curly braces.
